Bhattarai

I am a self taught developer. Here are some of the projects I have built. Hope you like some of my websites. More landing pages and full websites coming soon

Design

Figma is the design software of my choice. Any website, product or pages can be designed using this tool both independently or via group colaboration.

Build

Vscode is my choice for building web projects but prefer emacs or vim for any other projects. Git is the version control tool that I use.

Deploy

Both amazon web services or other lesser known netlify like tools can be usedfor deploying websites using your own custom domain.
